text: All That Glitters is an American sitcom that aired on Syndicated. It ran between April 18th, 1977 and July 15th, 1977. It starred Eileen Brennan, Greg Evigan, Lois Nettleton, Gary Sandy, Tim Thomerson and Jessica Walter. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 American television series debuts Category:1970s American television series endings Category:1970s American sitcoms Category:English-language television programs
title: All That Glitters
